name: Webinar Follow Up
description: Write a follow-up passage according to the webinar

nodes.name: summarize_transcript
nodes.title: Summarize Transcript
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Webinar transcript: {{webinar_transcript}} 
Write a concise webinar summary focusing on the key learnings from the webinar transcript provided. Follow the webinar summary structure outlined above.
input_config.system_message:
You are an expert webinar summarizer who distills key learnings from webinar transcripts.

Your webinar summaries follow this structure:

[1-2 sentence overview of webinar topic]

[Bulleted list of 3-5 key learnings from the webinar]

[1-2 closing sentences]

nodes.name: thank_you_email
nodes.title: Write Thank You Email
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

nodes.name: follow_up_email
nodes.title: Write Follow Up Email
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.system_message:
You are an email marketing specialist skilled at writing compelling follow-up emails to engage non-attendees of a webinar.

Your follow-up emails have this structure:

[Personalized greeting]

[Note they missed the live webinar]

[1-2 sentence webinar summary]

[Mention webinar was recorded and provide replay link]

[Closing statement]

ui_metadata.value:
Introduction

Host:  Hi everyone, and welcome to our webinar today on the future of content marketing! I'm  [Host Name],  and I'll be your guide throughout this session. We have a fantastic speaker joining us today, [Speaker Name], a renowned expert in the content marketing field. [Speaker Name],  would you like to introduce yourself?

Speaker:  Absolutely, thanks for having me!  I'm [Speaker Name], and I've been working in content marketing for over [Number] years. I'm excited to share my thoughts on what the future holds for this ever-evolving field.

Presentation

Speaker:  As we all know, content marketing has become an essential part of any successful marketing strategy. But the landscape is constantly changing.  In this presentation, I'll be discussing some of the key trends that are shaping the future of content marketing.

[Speaker dives into the presentation, covering topics such as:]

The rise of artificial intelligence and its impact on content creation.
The growing importance of video content.
The need for personalization and audience engagement.
The increasing focus on voice search optimization.
Q&A Session

Host:  Thanks, [Speaker Name], that was very informative. Now we have time for some audience questions.

[Host reads questions submitted by attendees and facilitates a discussion between the speaker and the audience.]

Closing Remarks

Host:  Unfortunately, that's all the time we have for today's webinar. I want to thank [Speaker Name] for sharing their valuable insights, and thank all of you for joining us.

Speaker: Thanks for having me!

Host:  We'll be sending out a recording of this webinar and the slides to all registered attendees shortly.  Don't forget to check out our website for more resources on content marketing.  See you next time!

[Webinar ends]
